title: marudagiri mEl uraiyum
sahitya:
marudagiri mEl uraiyum muruganadu malaraDiyai orupOdum inimEl maravAdiru manamE


anupallavi

  karuttODu nidam adanaik-karudi vara maravAdOr varuttam Edum urAda peru vAzhvu peruvAr


caraNam    innal uTru vADum anbar tannait-tEDi inbamuTru enrum irukka nADum pOdu
anbODu annArai aNaiyum tuNaivanAgi tannigarE illAdu tigazhum perumAn
